package Iso_Angled_Triangle; //@version 1.0; //@author Muireann import java.util.Scanner; public class Iso_Angled_Triangle { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); double height = sc.nextDouble(); double base =sc.nextDouble(); area(height,base); } public static void area(double height, double base) { System.out.println(0.5*(base*height)); circumference(base,height); } private static void circumference(double base, double height) { double half=(0.5*base); double triangle= Math.sqrt((half*half)+ (height*height)); System.out.println((triangle*2)+base); } }
